definition[0]: (1971â€“)  a Scottish actor whose films include Shallow Grave (1994), Trainspotting (1996), and Moulin Rouge (2001). He played young Obi-Wan Kenobi in the Star Wars prequel trilogy. He has made various motorbike journeys for TV: across Europe, Asia and North America for the programme Long Way Round (2004), and across Europe and Africa for Long Way Down (2007).
